name: SCIENCE EDUCATION TRUST

address: CRA 107, Muzhangodethu, Chenthi, Pongumoodu, Medical College PO, Trivandrum
Near Golden Gym, Near Kork Arena Indoor badminton Court

briefDescription: Science Education Trust aims to make proactive contributions to improve educational excellence among public school children and contribute to the efforts to elevate the quality of public education in Kerala to international standards. As the steps taken by the government to reinvigorate the flailing public education system in Kerala are bearing fruits, this project aims to further the cause by providing innovate educational interventions. While academic excellence in science is of paramount importance and a primary objective of this project, steps will be taken to improve the critical thinking, communication and reasoning faculties of the children involved.

address: CRA 107, Muzhangodethu, Chenthi, Pongumoodu, Medical College PO, Trivandrum
Near Golden Gym, Near Kork Arena Indoor badminton court
